General.Name: Harbin Xinguang Optic Electronics
General.Description: Harbin Xinguang Optic-Electronics Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of optoelectronic products in China. The company offers optical guidance systems, including optical imaging and non-imaging guidance; visible light optical imaging guidance simulators, solar simulators; infrared medium wave, and long wave optical guidance simulators; laser simulators; infrared-visible light, infrared-ultraviolet, infrared-laser, and infrared-radars; other multi-band composite guidance simulations; laser countermeasure systems; and optoelectronic special test equipment. It also provides technical consulting and other services. Harbin Xinguang Optic-Electronics Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Harbin, China.

1.Name: Mr. Yuwei  Wang
1.Title: Deputy GM, Board Sec. & Vice Chairman
